name: Steel Dynamics, Inc.
description: Steel Dynamics, Inc. is a leading domestic steel producer and metals recycler in the United States, founded in 1993. The company has rapidly grown to become one of the largest steelmakers in North America, specializing in the production of a wide range of steel products for various industries, including construction, automotive, and energy. Steel Dynamics operates several steel mills and recycling facilities, utilizing state-of-the-art technology to produce high-quality steel and steel products efficiently. The company is committed to sustainability and environmental stewardship, employing practices that minimize waste and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. Steel Dynamics also emphasizes innovation, continuously seeking ways to improve production processes and product offerings. Its diverse product portfolio includes hot-rolled, cold-rolled, and coated steel sheets, as well as structural and merchant products. Steel Dynamics is also involved in the production of steel joists and decks, which are essential for commercial construction projects. The company's mission is to be the most profitable steel company in the world while providing exceptional service to its customers and contributing positively to the communities where it operates.
